product_name: REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: An excellent training top for runners, the women's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt in plus sizes stretches comfortably and breathes freely. Polyester/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for easy movement. Fabric also offers a UPF 50+ sun protection rating. Mesh panels on sides combine with fabric's wicking ability to keep you drier. Flat seams and raglan shoulder design enhance your comfort level. Reflective details boost visibility in low light. The women's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt in plus sizes has an active fit that provides a full range of motion.
short_description: An excellent training top for runners, the women's REI Fleet Long-Sleeve T-Shirt in plus sizes stretches comfortably and breathes freely.
